alert.note: Alert for Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 05 at 4:29PM EDT until July 05 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Wake county, North Carolina. * WHEN...Until 715 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 428 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Raleigh, Cary, RDU International, Morrisville, Knightdale, and William B Umstead State Park.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads.
